1.content: which doctors girls will gain weight
1.title: the Doctor

12.content:
the Tenth Doctor;

Rose Tyler: a thin Blond hair girl, who love to wear tight clothes and has a crush on the doctor,

Martha Jone: the high strong girl who black hair, she is thin and a medical intern

Donna Noble: the Thin Red Head who is loud, but keeps the doctor on the right path
12.title: 10th

choices: Follow Rose as she heads to her flat
Follow the Doctor as he heads to the Rift
121.content:
The TARDIS eventually landed, following a lot of persuasion from the Doctor. Although he loved his TARDIS, he knew full well that it could be very tempromental at times. He had just returned to present day Earth with his faithful companion Rose Tyler following an adventure in 1950s London that involved a face-eating television.

"Right then, the Powell Estate. See, I told you we'd get here" The Doctor laughed. Rose giggled. She knew by now that it was down to pure luck whether they actually arrived where they wanted to go or not. She had been enjoying her time with the Doctor but she hadn't visited her mother in a long time.

"As much as I'd love a big reunion, I've got to pop off quickly", the Doctor said. "The TARDIS needs refueling so I'm going to pop to the rift and fill up. I'll come back tomorrow and pick you up. And then, we'll go to the planet Astor IV, where the Sky is constructed out of emeralds. How does that sound?"

"Amazing" replied Rose, as she exited the blue box. It seemed that the planets she visited with The Doctor continued to get better and better. It was almost a pain to leave they're lifestyle of finding new civilisations and fighting clockwork robots and Slitheen, but Rose did want to see her mum. After all, her old life seemed distant since she began her travels.

"Stay out of trouble!" called Rose to the Doctor. The Time Lord grinned as he fiddled about with the controls.
"Now where's the fun in that?" he replied as he set off. The TARDIS began to wheeze and groan as Rose began to walk towards her flat. She was finally back home.
121.title: Rose

choices: The Doctor goes to Rose's flat
The Doctor walks to the local park
1212.content:
The Doctor set the coordinates for Cardiff, hoping for a quick stop off. Previously, he would have been stuck in the Welsh capital for 24 hours whilst his ship recharged, but as the Rift had been active recently, he could recharge the TARDIS in about two hours. This was ideal as it meant he could quickly pop off on a test run before picking up Rose the next day.

"Right then, Allons-y!", yelled the Doctor as the TARDIS locked on to the Rift and began to land. At first, things seemed normal but then, the cloister bells began to chime, which the Doctor knew was bad news. He kept forwards and checked the monitor.

"What?" he cried as the TARDIS began to judder violently and groan. The Doctor stumbled backwards. "I must be stuck in a Time Eddy!" he shouted as he tried to regain control. Time Eddy were a rare occurrence. In fact, this was only the second occasion in which the Doctor was trapped in one, the first instance being when his fourth incarnation was trapped due to a time scoop gone wrong. However, the Doctor knew he could still escape. He quickly flicked some levers and glanced at the monitor. "Come on old girl, let's calm down a minute, eh?"

He pulled another lever as the TARDIS began to dematerialise again, locking onto it's last location, the Powell Estate. The Doctor looked on with relief as the cloister bells stopped chiming and everything seemed to settle.

"That's better. I'll have to give it a rest but I think we're OK for now." He ran to the chair and picked up his long brown coat before racing outside the spaceship, not realising that the monitor showed that the Time Eddy forced him six months into the future.
1212.title: Follow the Doctor as he heads to the Rift

12121.content:
The Doctor runs towards the block of flats, wanting to tell Rose about his troubles but couldn't help to notice that it was extremely quiet around the estate. Usually, there would be plenty of people bustling about, going about their business. However, it looked more like a ghost town that a council estate in the heart of London. He also noticed the large amount of litter scattered around the place, in particular fast food packaging such as burger wrappers, fired chicken buckets and large Pepsi bottles. The Doctor stared at the mess inquestitively, not noticing any of this earlier on. He quickly opens the door to the block of flats and paces up the stairs, noticing it was equally messy inside the building too, indicated that the rubbish hadn't been cleaned out for weeks.

The Doctor soon reached Rose's door and briskly knocked on it but received no reply. Impatient as he was, the Doctor decided died to open the locked door using his sonic screwdriver which whirred as it completed the task. The Doctor stepped into the front room, finding it in an extremely similar state to the outside of the building. It was littered with pizza boxes, drink cans, wrappers and more, with the floor barely visable beneath the clutter. The bemused Doctor then headed towards one of the other rooms.
12121.title: The Doctor goes to Rose's flat

121212.content:
The Doctor walks into Rose's bedroom, which was in a similar state to the rest of the flat. He wandered around for a moment, aware of the large array of odors that the room was producing. He picked up a half drunken bottle of Pepsi and decided to analyse it using his sonic. He pointed his screwdriver at the bottle but found no suspicious readings as a result. "What's going on here then?" muttered the Doctor, knowing something was up. After all, Rose's mum Jackie was somewhat of a perfectionist and would never allow the flat to get so messy. The Doctor continued to ponder and suddenly he heard the front door open. It was quiet for a moment before the Doctor heard a loud noise that nearly burst his eardrums.

"BUUUUUUURRRRRRRPPPPP!" cried an unknown figure from the other room, much to the Doctor's surprise. Then, the room began to shake violently as the figure moved across the flat and began to open the door to Rose's bedroom. The Doctor was frozen to the spot as the door burst open, as the figure emerged from the darkness. Suddenly, after a moment, The Doctor, still in shock managed to recognise who it was.
121212.title: Rose's room

choices: Rose is relives to see the Doctor and upset that he was gone for so ong
Rose is unresponsive and continues to scarf down her food
1212121.content:
The Doctor had found his friend but he could been forgiven for not recognising her at first. Rose who usually had a slim figure that most women would die for had ballooned. She looked like she now weighed about 350 pounds. Her cheekbones and enviable jawline had been replaced by extremely chubby cheeks and a large double chin that was slightly stained by some of the food she had been eating. Her breasts had expanded as well, now at least an Double D cup with Rose's hoodie struggling to contain them. Her arms were now very flabby and sported large love handles, which were useful in helping her carry vast quantities of food. Her tiny waistline had been replaced by a massive jiggling belly consisting of two large rolls, with the bottom on hanging out of her food stained goodies and over the waistband on her very tight jeans, with the button still manging to hold s despite Rose's massive girth. Her lifestyle of running with the Doctor was now well and truly over, with her huge thighs, wide hips ad almost 2 foot ass preventing her from running anywhere and she could barley waddle now. She was munching on a large portion of chips and chugging down a 2 litre bottle of Pepsi.

The Doctor was completely taken aback by his now obese companion. He swore he had only been away for a matter of minutes, but clearly by Rose's swelled form, he had been away for much longer than that.
1212121.title: It was Rose

123.content:
after spending sometime with the Doctor Donna fell in love with the life style. the clothes the eating what you want and not having to worry about how people thought she look, she knew the doctor didn't care and as a result she was eating a lot of fattier foods as of late.
waking up one day, she got up and looked around her room, it was a very speaceish room, much bigger then anything she had before. getting out of bed she slowly walked to the mirror, she has gotten acostume to sleeping in just her unders, grabbing a skirt she started to pull it up her long pale milky white legs, slipping it over her round firm ass, she set it to be where it need to be and start to try and zip it up. instead of zipping up like it normally does she had trouble with it, with a little bit of a fight she got it all the way zipped, and started to look for a fashionable shirt to wear. pulling it on it seem to be getting tighter around the belly and the chest but not really enough to worry her, stepping over to the mirror. she checked herself out real fast. you could tell by looking the mirror that she had gain some weight, her once flat belly was no longer flat and had start to get a pooch going, you could tell that her hips were starting to get wider. happy with what she saw in the mirror she deiced to see what was the plan for the day was from the lovely doctor. the man she adored and loved.
walking to the central room was a short walk sense the tards shortened the hallways to get her were she need to go, walking in she found the doctor read a history book and laugh rather loudly as he read it, morning doctor, she said. oh you are up dear, how was the sleep. it was good, Donna said blushing slightly from being called dear. what is the plan today? some exploring of the past or exploring of the future? or maybe a new world. none of the above Donna, the tards in to charge, so we will be going to present day earth to charge it, it will be a great chance for you to visit with your granddad and mum.
oh ok, Donna said a little taken a back from it she wasn't expecting to be going home to visit today. when are we going to arrive?, we are already there.
oh i see. Donna was a little nervous she hasn't seen her parents sense she had the metagenic transformation, and became a half time lord. keeping her that was nearly killed her but she did it, and she was happier then ever too.
123.title: Donna

13.content:
The Eleventh Individual To Be And As Such The One Who Is Called The Eleventh To Be Called "The Doctor".

Amelia "Amy" Pond: - The Red-Haired Young Woman Who Began As Having The One Called "The Doctor" As "An Imaginary "Childhood" "Friend"" Only For It To Be Later Shown That He Was Not At All "Imaginary".

River Song: - The Enigmatic Blond-Haired Woman That "Travels" At "At Least Almost Great Deals" That The One Called "The Doctor" Travels At.

Clara Oswald: - The Brown Haired Female Gendered University Professor With Many A Great Passion And Who Consuls The One Called "The Doctor" Whenever He Feels Troubled.
13.title: 11th

131.content: How does Amy get fat?
131.title: Amelia "Amy" Pond

1313.content: What other ways does Miss Pond gain weight?
1313.title: other

choices: Amy ignores the Doctor and grabs a bite to eat
Amy notices some strange activity and decides to investigate
13131.content:
Amy opened the door to the TARDIS as it appeared in the busy market place. Instantly her nostrils were barraged with foreign smells, some of which were a mixed between strange and delicious. She stepped out as the Doctor followed behind her, his head buried in a strange beeping device.

"So why are we here again?" said Amy as she took in the site of the strange aliens waking around.

"This is the largest Marketplace in the galaxy, I have noticed a disturbing amount of illegal items appearing on Earth recently and fear there may be a smuggling ring operating on earth." said the Doctor as he calibrated his machine.

"And you think that they have to be getting their supplies from here." said Amy as she noticed the merchants working away around her.

"Exactly, best place to start at the very least. My device here scanned the items found on Earth, if it detects and large amount of said items it will beep." said the Doctor as he scanned around the Market. A faint beep went off.

"Excellent, I will head off this way, I want you to stay here and alert me to any strange activity that you notice." said the Doctor.

"It's an intergalactic marketplace there's always strange activity going on." said Amy.

"Good then you won't miss anything. One last thing Pond, whatever you do, do not eat the food here, they very rarely get humans here which means there's no way of knowing what it could do to you." said the Doctor.

"Yeah, yeah got it, no food." said Amy barely paying attention as she took in the sites around her.

The Doctor shrugged before turning his attention back to the device.

"Good luck Pond and see you soon."

The Doctor walked off with his head buried in the device. Meanwhile, Amy just couldn't shake off the delicious aromas she was smelling and seemed to finally notice that her belly was rumbling.
13131.title: The Girl Who Waited and the Alien Marketplace.

choices: Quickly puts on weight from the amount of calories in the pie
Becomes even hungrier and craves more food.
131311.content:
Amy tried her best to be mindful of her surroundings but her stomach just wouldn't stop rumbling. It only got worse as time went on and Amy eventually caught a wiff of something so delicious that she left her post next to the TARDIS.

The smell was divine and she couldn't help but to follow it. She finally found the source, a small booth off to the side of what looked to be some kind of food court. The food at the booth looked to be some kind of meat pie. The vendor was a humanoid looking creature that's only really difference from a normal person was the fact that it had four eyes.

"Well it's close to a human so maybe the food is human friendly." thought Amy. Her little excuse was all she needed to go forward and order a slice of the meat pie.

With a smile the vendor handed her a slice. For a second Amy hesitated thinking about what could happen but threw her worries to the wind the second the vendor handed her a fork.

With a big smile Amy took a bite and when wide eyed from how delicious the taste was. Unknown to her the pie was starting to have an effect on her.
131311.title: Too Hungry to care

choices: Go try some other samples in the Marketplace
1313111.content:
Amy gulped down the pie as quickly as she could. In three large bites she had finished almost half of the pie. A couple of passing aliens stopped for a second to glance at the strange red headed creature eating a massive pie. Amy didn't care, the pie was just to good. What Amy didn't know was that the pie was meant for long term stasis travel and was meant to keep the body stocked on essential nutrients for longer trips where food was abundant. Luckily, she had eaten one of the smaller pies meant for a two day trip.

With one final gulp Amy finished off the pie. She licked her fingers clean and smiled. If she were to look down she would have noticed the beginning of a food baby and maybe a small extra layer of pudge on her belly. From behind her butt filled the seat of her skirt just a little more and the same could be said for her breasts and her bra. All in all she had maybe put on about five pounds.

The clerk was shocked he had never seen eat one of his pies so quickly.

"Would you care for seconds." he said as he looked at the strange read head in front of him.
1313111.title: Quickly puts on weight from the amount of calor...

choices: The Small Pie (5 Pound Weight gain)
The Large Pie (30 pound Weight gain)
13131111.content:
Amy sighed as she picked at the crumbs from the pie on her shirt. A second later she felt her stomach groan and almost bent over in hunger. Somehow she was craving another one of the delicious pies. She licked her lips, in front of her were two choices. A pie of about the same size as the one she already ate or one that was twice the size.

Amy was so hungry it was almost impossible to decide.
13131111.title: Go in for seconds

131311112.content:
"Give me the large one," Amy moaned out, her stomach growling loud enough for the clerk to hear.

The clerk didn't hesitate as he looked through his meat pies, trying to find a large enough one to quake her appetite. It took a while, but he managed to find one, but it was really big. About a full foot and a half in diameter.

"Here you are, ma'am," the clerk said to Amy, handing her the pie in both hands.

Amy looked at the pie with wide eyes. It wasn't out of shock about the size of it, though. It was out of shock that she was actually hungry enough for something that big. She was a little hesitant about eating it at first, but her hunger overruled any other sense in her head.

Amy was so hungry she even through aside all use of manners. She threw aside her fork, grabbed the pie from the clerk, and started eating it like a pig.

The clerk himself was surprised that the redheaded woman in front of him so quickly rid herself of all reason and mannerism and started eating one his pies so quickly, and so messily. He knew she would probably want more, and he couldn't have her eating all his wares, so he crouched behind the counter and put up the closed sign.

Amy didn't notice, through. She was too busy gorging herself on the large meat pie. Surprisingly, she managed to make a total pig of herself, and not get a crumb of food anywhere but down her maw. She was so busy eating, that she didn't even realize how much she had eaten until she bit down and felt pain in her hands.

"Ow!" Amy said as she opened her eyes and saw that the big pie was gone, and she had taken a bite of her own hands. Sad that the meat pie was gone, she started licking her fingers to get the rest of the taste off.

Looking down, however, Amy saw that she was slowly swelling a bit. Her eyes widened as her breasts grew two more cup sizes, causing a valley of cleavage to pop out of the top of her already too small shirt. Her breasts had grown to nearly a D cup, making her bra extremely uncomfortable and eclipsing the view of her feet.

Amy then noticed a mirror nearby and looked at her reflection, seeing what other places she was growing in. Her stomach had swelled a bit more and stretched out her shirt. Said shirt was already having trouble covering her new breasts, so it rode up her bigger stomach until it uncovered her belly button. Her stomach had grown enough to make her look six months pregnant, but couldn't stop jiggling.

Amy turned to the side to see where else she was growing. Her butt was sticking out more, and she had to hold back a gasp. It was now a ghetto booty that was stretching her short skirt tight. She could actually hear seems popping as her ass finally stopped growing.

The new weight was evenly distributed across her body as her cheeks were softer, her thighs now rubbed together and stretched her leggings, her hips widened to support her butt, and she had a double chin forming.

Amy looked down at her new, larger body, figuring she now weighed about 160 pounds. She looked at how much chunkier she was with a look of...
131311112.title: Starving Amy

13132.content: How does Amy get pregnant?
13132.title: Pregnancy

choices: The Doctor shows up to save the day
131321.content:
We find our heroes in the middle of another adventure. Everything had been going fine, Amy and the Doctor had come to this planet with the idea of enjoying the nice tropical weather. However, it turned out the alien race that lived on the planet were hostile and in a surprise attack Amy and the Doctor were separated. Amy had been captured and tied to an alter after they dressed her in a ceremonial hula skirt and a white bra.

The aliens were chanting in their language and were stirring a big pot of blue substance.

"Doctor I don't know where you are but would you hurry about." said Amy out loud to the air.

Her calls for help were answered by the aliens bringing out a large brush.

"Doctor hurry up!" yelled Amy.

The aliens dipped the brush into the pot the thick blue substance coated the brush. The chanting grew louder as two aliens moved towards.

"I'm serious Doctor, now is the time to come to my rescue.” said Amy not slightly fearful for what that brush could do.
131321.title: Alien ritual
